plot outline: Daaji's son and daughter in law were killed by a ruthless officer Kaufner.Daaji now lives an exciting life with his grandson Govind a mischievous but good Vitti Dandu Player.The arrival of British turns as revolt to villagers.But Daaji considers it a boon in order to protect Govind.But villagers go against him by saying that he has no value for sacrifices done by his son an daughter in law.
title: Vitti Dandu
plot: In this exploration of the relationship between a grandfather and a grandson at the time of Indian independence, the question of whether one's love of country should supersede love of family is a central one.

Daaji's son and daughter in law were killed by a ruthless officer Kaufner.Daaji now lives an exciting life with his grandson Govind a mischievous but good _Vitti Dandu_ (qv) Player.The arrival of British turns as revolt to villagers.But Daaji considers it a boon in order to protect Govind.But villagers go against him by saying that he has no value for sacrifices done by his son an daughter in law.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
